overview: This is a tender tale of the delightful inhabitants of Paradise Island, a beautiful island in the South Pacific. Here lives out Heroine , a warm-hearted , peace-loving dragon with large gentle eyes... Her name is "Serendipity". Always tender and elegant she guards the sea around the island with Jeffries d Bobby a young boy who has been stranded.  Edited from the Nippon Television series into a feature-length movie for U.S. release.
title: Serendipity The Pink Dragon
